name: Spin Race - Zig Zag Drift Line
name_original: Spin Race - Zig Zag Drift Line
description:
CUTE AND SMART ;-) REACTION TEST !

Spin the obstacles on the road to move forward.
Tap the screen to rotate obstacles and make the road free.

√ Various design themes: winter, space, etc.
√ Increasing speed and difficulty
√ Dynamic test of your reaction

Let's start! Go as far as you can!
